text: Victor Brandt (born September 19, 1942) is an American actor. Brandt was born in Los Angeles, California. He is known for being the voice of Master Pakku in Avatar: The Last Airbender, as Rupert Thorne in The Batman, and as General Crozier in Metalocalypse. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:American video game actors Category:Actors from Los Angeles
title: Victor Brandt
